message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can offer you a compromise at $135. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?

I'm glad we're close to an agreement, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable going as low as $130. I can offer you a slight adjustment at $137.50. It's a small premium, but I think it's a fair price for the product's quality and value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to go above $130. I'm willing to meet you at $133. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $133?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I can offer you a final compromise at $140. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go above $133. I'm willing to make a final offer of $134. If I don't get a better price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
